original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma

original: 20.3. Āsavagocchaka
analyzed: āsavagocchaka

original: Naāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na āsavam dhammam paṭicca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsavam dhammam paṭicca

original: noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo ca
analyzed: noāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsavam dhammam paṭicca āsavaḥ ca noāsavaḥ ca

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na no āsavam dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na no āsavam dhamma

original: paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ca noāsavo
analyzed: paṭicca āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na noāsavam dhammam paṭicca āsavaḥ ca noāsavaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na āsavañca na no āsavañca dhammam paṭicca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava

original: Nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa āsavam dhamma

original: paṭicca anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ca
analyzed: paṭicca anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ ca

original: anāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: anāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nasāsavañca naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa āsavañca na anāsavañca dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca …pe… ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca pe ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca

original: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava

original: Naāsavañceva anāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na āsavam ca iva anāsavam ca dhammam paṭicca āsavaḥ ca iva sa āsavaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava

original: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na āsavañca iva na āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca āsavaḥ ca iva āsava sampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ sa āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca
